battleTraits.description: Roll 1D6 or choose from the table below

table.name: Seasoned Fighters
table.effect: +1 to hit rolls in melee on turn unit charged or was charged

table.name: Grizzled
table.effect: Unit ignores modifiers to Combat Attrition tests

table.name: Inured to Hardship
table.effect: Unit ignores first failed wound each phase

table.name: Relentless Assault
table.effect: Advance and Charge in the same turn

weaponEnhancements.description: Roll 2D6 (reroll duplicates) or choose from the table below

table.name: Shredder
table.effect: Wound rolls of 6 cause 1 mortal wound (max 3 per phase)

table.name: Digital Destruction
table.effect: Bearer gains Devastating Wounds for this weapon

table.name: Legendary
table.effect: Choose two enhancements from this table

crusadeRelics.description: Characters only - choose one relic (limit 1 per Character)

relics.name: Blackstone Shard Amulet
relics.effect: 4+ Feel No Pain against mortal wounds

relics.name: Laurels of Victory
relics.effect: Once per battle, auto-pass one Morale test

relics.name: The Burning Blade
relics.effect: Melee weapons gain +1 Strength and Damage

relics.name: Vortex Grenade
relics.effect: Once per battle: 6" range, D6 mortal wounds (2D6 vs Vehicles/Monsters)

relics.name: Digital Weapons
relics.effect: Bearer gains 3 additional melee attacks at S4 AP-1 D1

relics.name: The Honour Vehement
relics.effect: Re-roll hit and wound rolls for bearer's melee attacks

psychicFortitudes.description: Psykers only - roll 1D6 or choose from the table below

table.name: Psychic Barrier
table.effect: 5+ Feel No Pain vs mortal wounds from Psychic attacks

table.name: Ghost Walk
table.effect: Can move through models and terrain

table.name: Warp Siphon
table.effect: Once per battle, regain D3 wounds when manifesting

table.name: Mind Fortress
table.effect: Cannot be targeted by enemy Psychic abilities unless closest unit

battleScars.description: Roll 1D6 when a unit fails an Out of Action test

table.name: Disordered
table.effect: -1 to hit rolls in the first battle round
